entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 8:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 8.7°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning near noon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
